mapper.sql: lecturesid, lecturesname, speechmaker, lecturestype, collegesid, Registrationtype, lecturescontent, papeview, enrollnumber, addtime, lecturestime, poster
mapper.insert: insert into lectures (lecturesid, lecturesname, speechmaker, lecturestype, collegesid, Registrationtype, lecturescontent, papeview, enrollnumber, addtime, lecturestime, poster ) values (#{lecturesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lecturesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{speechmaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lecturestype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collegesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registrationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lecturescontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{papeview,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enrollnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lecturestime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{poster,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into lectures
lecturesid,
lecturesname,
speechmaker,
lecturestype,
collegesid,
Registrationtype,
lecturescontent,
papeview,
enrollnumber,

lecturestime,

mapper.update:
update lectures
lecturesname = #{lecturesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
speechmaker = #{speechmaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lecturestype = #{lecturestype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
collegesid = #{collegesid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Registrationtype = #{registrationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lecturescontent = #{lecturescontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
papeview = #{papeview,jdbcType=BIGINT},
enrollnumber = #{enrollnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lecturestime = #{lecturestime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
poster = #{poster,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where lecturesid = #{lecturesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lectures set lecturesname = #{lecturesname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, speechmaker = #{speechmaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lecturestype = #{lecturestype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collegesid = #{collegesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Registrationtype = #{registrationtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lecturescontent = #{lecturescontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, papeview = #{papeview,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enrollnumber = #{enrollnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lecturestime = #{lecturestime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, poster = #{poster,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where lecturesid = #{lecturesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select l.* ,c.*,lt.* from (lectures l left join colleges c ON c.collegesid = l.collegesid )left join lecturestype lt on lt.lecturestypeid=l.lecturestype
